description: API and web app meant to save and deliver quotes curated by myself and fellow top minds.
description_bullets: API functionality to deliver random quotes on command via JSON
Database created in PostgreSQL, using Django and Heroku
Custom user interface that allows for CRUD operations on all saved quotes

description: Mobile menu web app meant for assisting a cocktail bar with ordering and prepping drinks.
description_bullets: Beautiful web app interface for ordering drinks
Additional web app interface allowing bartenders to view current orders
Database created in PostgreSQL, using Django and Heroku
Recipes stored in the database to allow for quick reference for bartenders when crafting drinks
